## AlAxios.remove() method

发送 DELETE 请求

**Signature:**

```typescript
remove<T = any>(url: string, data: any, options?: RequestOptionsType): Promise<CommonResultType<T>>;
```

Promise<!-- -->&lt;<!-- -->CommonResultType<T>&gt; 请求响应结果

## Example


```typescript
// 删除用户
const response = await request.remove(
  '/api/users/1',
  { id: 1 },
  {
    isShowLoading: true,
    loadingMessageText: '删除中...',
    isShowSuccessMessage: true,
    successMessageText: '删除成功！'
  }
)
```
